summary: Glossary CSV file is used for importing and exporting glossary terms from and to an **existing** glossary.

headers.name: parent
headers.description: Fully qualified name of the parent glossary term. If the glossary term being created is at the root of the glossary without any parent term, leave this as empty.
examples: `""` or empty, if the term is at the root of the glossary.
`Business terms.Customer` as parent to create a term `CustomerId` under it.

headers.name: name
headers.description: The name of the glossary term being created.

headers.name: description
headers.description: Description for the glossary term in markdown format.
examples: `Customer Identifier` as defined by the **Legal Team**.

headers.name: relatedTerms
headers.description: List of related glossary term **fully qualified names** separated by `;`.

headers.name: references
headers.description: External glossary references for the glossary term in the format `name;URL endPoint`.

headers.name: tags
headers.description: Classification tags associated with the glossary term. These tags are automatically applied along with the glossary term, when it is used to label an entity.
